flawed_nl_solution:
Being 7019 km the distance from Spain to Russia. To get from Germany to Russia, Peter has to travel 7019 - 1615 = <<7019-1615=5407>>5407 km
Knowing both distances, Peter will answer that he has to fly 5407 + 7019 = <<5407+7019=12426>>12426 km
#### 12426

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5404, not 5407. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
